root.name: Pajama Sam: Lost and Found
root.description: Pajama Sam: Lost and Found is a game where Pajama Sam is cleaning his extremely messy room and goes on an adventure to find all of the things he had lost in his messy room. The game isn't a point and click adventure, but rather an arcade game where Pajama Sam controls a talking boat.
